sql.name: queryXhCapitalLoanReportList
sql.sqlString: select sum(b.all_money) as ALL_MONEY, min(b.first_lend_date) as First_LEND_DATE, b.first_lend_money as FIRST_LEND_MONEY, c.tzsqbh as LEND_NO , b.lend_type as LEND_TYPE ,sum(b.shoud_back) as ALL_SHOULD_BACK, sum(b.real_back) as ALL_REAL_BACK,sum(b.re_lend) as ALL_RE_LEND,sum(b.drawing) as ALL_DRAWING from XH_CAPITAL_LOAN_REPORT a,XH_CAPITAL_LOAN_REPORT_INFO b ,xh_tzsq c where 1=1 and b.report_id=a.id and a.zqtj_id=c.id $sql group by b.first_lend_money,c.tzsqbh,b.lend_type,a.all_money_of_current

sql.name: queryLoanReportListForDown
sql.sqlString: select a.id,to_char(a.report_date,'yyyy-MM-dd') as report_date ,c.tzsqbh ,b.cjrxm from XH_CAPITAL_LOAN_REPORT a,xh_tzsq c,xh_cjrxx b where 1=1 and a.zqtj_id=c.id and c.cjrxx_id = b.id $sql order by a.id
